name: Block Man Adventures
description:
This is a game in which you are to go through ten levels and wish an inspirational challenge to each, but if you give up or YELD, you can skip all the levels except the last. If you are able to beat all the levels, then you can beat ten easers. Let's see how much you give up.

Controls
For the fist levels the controls will be W ,A ,D or left, right and up then in level 3 the jump will change to space.






My Thoughts
This is my first time fully coding something like this, but I know this game will be a grind for some people, but it will be fun and gratifying when people finish these ten levels, and all I can say is, Can you win?
